name: CODE_SET_ACCESS
documentation: Defines an object providing proxy access to a code_set.

id.name: id
id.documentation: External identifier of this code set.

all_codes.name: all_codes
all_codes.documentation: Return all codes known in this code set.

has_lang.name: has_lang
has_lang.documentation: True if code set knows about 'a_lang' .

has_code.name: has_code
has_code.documentation: True if code set knows about  'a_code'.
